import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import {EmployeeService} from "./employee.service"; import {Observable} from "rxjs"; import {Employee} from "./model/Employee"; @Component({ selector: 'app-root', templateUrl: './app.component.html', styleUrls: ['./app.component.css'] }) export class AppComponent { employees$: Observable constructor(private employeeService: EmployeeService) { this.employees$ = employeeService.getEmployees(); } remove(id: number) { this.employeeService.deleteEmployee(id); } }
